programs:
as principal admin password "admin" do
create principal bob "bob"
create principal chris "chris"
create principal dave "dave"
set x = "abc"
set y = "yyy"
return x
***
as principal admin password "admin" do
set delegation x admin read -> bob
set delegation x admin read -> chris
set delegation x bob read -> dave
set delegation x chris read -> dave
return ""
***
as principal admin password "admin" do
delete delegation x admin read -> bob
return ""
***
as principal admin password "admin" do
delete delegation x chris read -> dave
return ""
***
as principal dave password "dave" do
return x
***
